title: Honto ni Atta! Reibai Sensei
synopsis: The story revolves around Kibayashi, a teacher whose hobby is speaking with the dead and whose special talent is exorcism. She seems to know everything about the other world, yet nothing about our own.
voices: ['Mizuhara, Kaoru', 'Matsuki, Miyu', 'Katou, Emiri', 'Mizuhara, Kaoru', 'Katou, Emiri', 'Ono, Yuuki', 'Fuchigami, Mai', 'Matsuki, Miyu', 'Katou, Emiri', 'Ono, Yuuki']
staff: [['Tani, Azuma', ['Director', ' Screenplay']], ['Umoto, Yuuji', ['Episode Director']], ['Matsumoto, Hidekichi', ['Original Creator']]]
